name: Detalle Facturacion Recurrente Mensual
query:
select c.name as Regnumber, c.customer_name as Nombre, c.company_name as Company, c.territory as Departamento, c.municipio, c.barrio, c.address_line1 as direccion,
si.name as Factura, si.posting_date as Fecha_Factura, si.currency as moneda, si.grand_total, c.item_group as portafolio, si.docstatus,
(select ruta from `tabDetalle Ciclo Facturacion` where sales_invoice=si.name) as ruta
from `tabCustomer` c inner join `tabSales Invoice` si on c.name=si.customer
where si.posting_date>=%(FechaD)s
and si.posting_date<=%(FechaH)s
and si.naming_series='A-'
and si.docstatus=1
order by si.name
